name: Future Memories
description:
'your future thoughts are actually memories.' 

- - -
(..wait a moment until you see grey canvas.)
click to play. click again to pause.

hover your mouse around the canvas to get different effect affecting the music, adding more nuance to the movement of the sound.

optimised for web browser chrome.
- - -

/* if you curious about the nerd stuff :

i made this using p5js. a generative painting over time, using perlin noise as the drive force, and the color palette based on a photo that i provided.

it will generate slightly different pattern every time you refresh the browser, accompanied by a seamless loop music that i composed.
  
moving the mouse from left to right of the canvas, 
will alter the panning position of the music (left to right) and the cutoff filter (low to high).

moving the mouse from bottom to top of the canvas,
will alter the resonance of the filter.
*/
